Literature.Title: Too Hot to Handle: Antibacterial Peptides Identified in Ghost Pepper

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (38.1%) tofrog Pelophylaxin-2GYNot similar to known plant AMPs. GRAVY: 0.278; Mol formula:  C174H290N50O45S6; Mol Wt: 4020.906, and Mol ex coeff.: 1865.Chemical modification:  Three S-S bonds: C1-C2, C3-C6, and C4-C5.Activity:  active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (IC50 7.6 uM). Warning: Other bacteria not tested due to limited material. Reg. 12/2021
